ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Toth,Michael Wm Kaluta,Mike Kaluta,Jack Abel,Alex Toth,George Roussos,Bill Draut
ComicInfo.Summary:
Trick or Treat: A con-man decides to pose as the Prince of Darkness.
Look Homeward, Angelo!: Angelo's adoptive parents believe he is the cause of the haunting in their new house.
The Captive!: A gangland boss wants a painter to create a portrait of himself.
The Big Break!: John Cobern escapes from prison only to be trapped in the house of his youth by a curse.
ComicInfo.Title: Trick or Treat; Look Homeward, Angelo!; The Captive!; The Big Break!
